snippet: Andy Murray has had his mind elsewhere for much of the Australian Open but will need to bring laser-sharp focus into Friday's semi-final against the red-hot Milos Raonic....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray has had his mind elsewhere for much of the Australian Open but will need to bring laser-sharp focus into Friday's semi-final against the red-hot Milos Raonic.

headline.print_headline: Defender Murray Focuses on Raonic Assault
headline.main: Defender Murray Focuses on Raonic Assault
